author: Jeff Garzik
title: The End of Bitcoin Maximalism
description: “The idea that one coin must dominate all others ignores the power of collaboration and innovation,” says Jeff Garzik, a co-founder of Hemi Labs and an original Bitcoin developer.
content: The launch of Bitcoin in 2009 created a resilient and decentralized monetary asset. Early adherents rallied around it as a singular innovation immutable, fixed-supply, and leaderless. Over time, this… [+4953 chars]
